page.title: 19GENERATIONS IN BROCKWORTH
page.content: Some local {OAPs} remember the housing estates as farms and fields;and that there was"A big tree for meeting and not a town hall".{Social change} was also revealed in the statement "The nursing- homes are more crowded nowadays"(n.b... about 20% of the county's citizens are OAPs). But {kids} still play the traditional games-"Here it is,this is the lane. Quick run now,don't get caught,be quiet Shhh! We can stop running now .They won't catch us.Here's the turning,up this hill,through the nettles.What was that? A gunshot.Quick run,it's steep. There's the gun again but he won't find us here". Times change though-"You can walk the rarely used footpaths by the brooks or wander alone out into the fields-nature near a motorway".
